thread.title_full: Win Summer Holiday Essentials with the Telegraph - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Win Summer Holiday Essentials with the - Telegraph
text: WIN an Al Fresco Holiday for 4 at Camping in Park Umag, Istria, Croatia Staying in a Puccini Riviera, mobile home with decking & BBQ. Park Umag is a 4 star campsite laid out spaciously within delightful Istrian garden sloping gently to an extensive shoreline. The pool complex features a large outdoor swimming pool with huge children’s pirate ship and lots of water games. 2 miles of seafront promenade with blue flag beaches. Children’s playgrounds, entertainment team & program with shows and live music. Al Fresco Holidays offer a popular choice for family holidays with over 12 years’ experience and parks in France, Spain, Croatia, Holland and Italy. With great last minute summer savings up to 20% that you can combine with an additional 20% TELE20 promo code to be used on the website, just for you readers. So you can book your dream holiday today just call us on 0161 332 8900 or visit www.alfresco-holidays.com Win £250 to spend at BrandAlley.co.uk BrandAlley, the online destination for discounted designer shopping, are offering you the chance to win £250 to spend on your favourite designer brands. With exciting new sales launching every day and up to 70% off the biggest names in fashion, beauty and home, BrandAlley is your one-stop shop for all things fabulous. Why not update your wardrobe and home this summer with beautiful products from the likes of Michael Kors, Ted Baker, Ray-Ban, Gucci, Bombay Duck, Parks London and many more - all at up to 70% off. For more information on BrandAlley visit www.brandalley.co.uk Stay, Park & Drive with Holiday Extras Holiday Extras is offering the chance to win a relaxing start to your next holiday with an overnight stay at a 4-star UK airport hotel and up to two weeks’ holiday parking - as well as £50 off your foreign holiday car hire booked with Holiday Extras. This prize is the perfect treat for two people looking to leave behind their everyday stresses and indulge in some much-needed pampering. Booking an overnight stay at an airport hotel guarantees that you board that all-important flight on time and you can start the holiday mood a day early! Holiday Extras is offering an extra 10% off airport hotel and parking bookings – follow this link to book – Extras 10% off! Holiday Extras searches thousands of destinations and car hire companies so you don't have to. Our partner - Flexible Car Hire - has over 20 years’ experience in car rental, offering the most competitive rates from the biggest names in car hire - Alamo, Europcar, National, Enterprise and SIXT. Remember to download our time-saving booking App! When you’re on the go, book through the speedy Holiday Extras’ mobile app, available to download at www.HolidayExtras.co.uk/Hol01 We take the hassle, you take the holiday… Win a 3 night break at a choice of locations with Natural Retreats Natural Retreats provide luxury self-catering accommodation and exhilarating experiences across some of the UK’s most popular holiday destinations. From luxurious eco-lodges in the Yorkshire Dales to cosy stone cottages in North Wales and everything in between. We are delighted to offer you the chance to win a 3 night break at a choice of our Retreats. Enjoy our award-winning lodges in the Yorkshire Dales, the breath-taking scenery of the North Highlands at John O’Groats or a Cornish break at Natural Retreats Trewhiddle, South Cornwall. Whichever you choose, you can be sure of a family holiday to remember. If you’re not lucky enough to win we are currently offering up to 20% off summer stays. Whether you’re looking for a romantic bolthole, a beautiful lodge in the English countryside or a handpicked coastal holiday home for a large family getaway, there’s a deal to tempt you. For more information visit www.naturalretreats.com/uk Win 2 tickets to the BBC Good Food Show Winter with New Covent Garden Soup Co Look out for our new ‪‎ soup‬ range for summer in store now. These classic combinations are all bursting with flavour. Plus, buy any promotional pack and you can claim your ‪FREE‬ packet of seeds for summer. We have 37,000 packets of seeds to giveaway so you too can grow some delicious salad leaves to enjoy alongside your soup. Why not recycle your empty New Covent Garden Soup carton to grow them in? (T&C’s apply). Visit our website for your FREE seeds or if you need a helping hand with growing or recipe ideas for your salad leaves www.newcoventgardensoup.com . New Covent Garden Soup Company are going to BBC Good Food Winter to spread our love of soup and we’d love you to join us, we have 2 tickets to giveaway! Win the Ultimate Old Golden Hen BBQ Pack Thanks to Old Golden Hen the tricky question of choosing the perfect beer for a barbecue with friends and family is now a given. Delivering both flavour and refreshment Old Golden Hen is brewed using the finest pale malts and the rare galaxy hop to give a light golden colour, subtle tropical fruit notes and a deliciously smooth finish. Available in 500ml cans, 5L mini kegs, single bottles and a 12x355ml BBQ pack, it’s no surprise Old Golden Hen is now the number one golden ale in the off-trade. This ultimate BBQ prize package includes – TWO Old Golden Hen BBQ packs and TWO Old Golden Hen 5 litre mini-kegs, plus two pairs of sunglasses, an ice bucket, two jars of tasty Old Golden Hen marmalade and a Jamie Oliver Park BBQ. www.oldspeckledhen.co.uk Competition closes Friday, 24 July 2015 Terms and Conditions Online Form - Win Summer Holiday Essentials with the Telegraph Follow @telegraph
